ingredients.ingredient: 1 ¼ pounds lean pork, cut into cubes
2 ½ cups Thai-style coconut curry stir-fry sauce

cookingTips: Cut pork into uniform cubes so they cook evenly throughout
Brown the pork before adding sauce for better flavor and texture
Use a jarred sauce to simplify the recipe while still achieving authentic Thai flavors
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Tell the user to simmer gently after adding the sauce so the pork stays tender and absorbs all the flavors.
